pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Sign Decorators to inherit signature form one function to another. Mainly useful when a function or method takes `*args, **kwargs` and pass them(mostly unmodified) to another function or methods. This will merge the signature of the decorated function, with the target function to simplify inspection. ## example```def foo(a=1, b=2): pass@sign.inherit(foo):def bar(*args, **kwargs): return foo(*args, **kwargs)````bar` signature should appear as:```bar(*args, a=1, b=2, **kwargs)```
